page.title: 13HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: THORNHILL HEALTH CENTER provides basic care for the surrounding area.The four doctors there are assisted by two secretaries,one cleaner,one health visitor and four district nurses. Baby;Ante_natal;Psychiatric;Geriatric; and Opthalmic clinics are run in the center using either local doctors or visiting specialists. Patients requiring hospital treatment are sent to DUMFRIES ROYAL INFIRMARY or to specialist hospitals in Glasgow. Three ambulancemen and two ambulances are also based in Thornhill.They attend emergencies such as heart attacks and road accidents as well as carrying patients for treatment in Dumfries. The 15 bed cottage-hospital in Thornhill is a geriatric unit only which offers no medical care.
